title: Cloud API Type
note: Choose which kind of cloud drive you want to connect 🌥️

title: Folder Name
note: Optional: The name of the folder you want to explore 🗂️✨

title: Google Drive Folder ID
note:
Tell me which Google Drive folder I should explore 🗂️✨
— just paste the folder ID (that random string in the URL after `/folders/...`) and I’ll keep an eye on it for you!
eq: `https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/[the-id]`

title: Cloud API Address
note:
The entry gate *Base URL* to your cloud drive 🚀.
Endpoint:
- `/files`: browse your files 📂.
- `/build`: build the data model 🛠️

title: Cloud API Token
note: Your secret key to unlock the cloud drive 🔑☁️

title: Data Name
note: The name of the data you want to explore 🗂️✨

title: Auto Build
note: Auto build the data model when the data source changes 🔄

title: OCR API Base URL
note: The entry gate *Base URL* to your OCR API🚀

title: OCR API Key/Token
note: The token key to your OCR API🚀
